## EXPLORATORY ANALYSIS
- Number of visits per patient


```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=4, fig.width=14}
##################################################################
##################### DATA VISUALIZATION  ########################
##################################################################
                           
library(ggplot2)

# patient
ggplot(data= Gdata, aes(factor(Patient), fill=1) ) + 
  geom_bar()+
  theme(legend.position = "none", axis.text.x  = element_text(angle=90, hjust=1, vjust=0.9)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = mean(mean(table(Patient))), color="red")

```

```{r include=FALSE}

N
```

## RNFL average


```{r echo=FALSE , fig.height=4, fig.width=8,  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}


## define base for the graphs and store in object 'p'
p <- ggplot(data = Gdata[!is.na(RNFL_average),], aes(x = time, y = RNFL_average, group = Patient, color= factor(Patient) )  )

## just plotting points (a.k.a., scatterplot)
#p 

p + geom_line() + geom_point() +
     stat_smooth(aes(group = 1)) 


```


## RNFL average

- By Sex

```{r echo=FALSE , fig.height=2, fig.width=6 ,  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

p3 <- ggplot(data = Gdata[!is.na(RNFL_average) &!is.na(Sex),], aes(x = time, y = RNFL_average, group = Patient, color= factor(Patient) )  )

p3 + geom_line() + geom_point() +
     stat_smooth(aes(group = 1))  +
     stat_summary(aes(group = 1), fun.y = mean, shape = 17, size = 0.5) + facet_grid(. ~ Sex)

```


## RNFL average

- Only POAG Glaucoma

```{r echo=FALSE , fig.height=2, fig.width=6 ,  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}


p4=ggplot(data = Gdata[Type_of_glaucoma=="POAG",], aes(x = time, y = RNFL_average, group = Patient, color= factor(Patient)))

p4 + geom_line() + geom_point() +
     stat_smooth(aes(group = 1))  +
     stat_summary(aes(group = 1), fun.y = mean, shape = 17, size = 0.5) 

```
